pageContext.claim: “[Rush Limbaugh has] got one of the biggest audiences in the history of the world. I mean, this guy is unbelievable. Try speaking for three hours without taking calls.”
pageContext.analysis: Rush Limbaugh does have a big audience. Some estimates put it nearly 14 million listeners, but that lags behind NPR's Newscasts which have more than 28 million listeners. Both pale in comparison to major international events like the Olympics, which draw billions of viewers.
